inclusion.criterion: Severe aortic stenosis (AS) based on overall clinical impression, with or without
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Scheduled for clinically indicated elective aortic valve replacement for a primary diagnosis of severe AS.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Less than moderate aortic regurgitation on preoperative testing.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Isolated aortic valve replacement; or aortic valve replacement with concomitant coronary artery bypass grafting, ascending aorta repair, or mitral and/or tricuspid annuloplasty for functional mitral regurgitation / tricuspid regurgitation.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Left ventricular ejection fraction ≥ 40% on preoperative testing.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Physically able and willing to pedal a recumbent bicycle.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patient and surgeon agree that the patient will undergo valve replacement with a bioprosthesis.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient and surgeon agree that the use of one specific bioprosthesis manufacturer / model is not indicated based on clinical criteria.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Willing to undergo randomization to have implanted one of three bioprostheses at the time of aortic valve replacement.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing and able to undergo preoperative echocardiography/Doppler for purposes of the research study.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Willing and able to undergo post-operative exercise stress echocardiography/Doppler 5 to 7 months after valve replacement for purposes of the research protocol.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: AS felt by overall clinical impression to be less than severe
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Aortic valve replacement is urgent or emergent
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Moderate of more aortic regurgitation on preoperative testing.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Concomitant mitral or tricuspid valve replacement
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Left ventricular ejection fraction < 40% on preoperative testing.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has severe aortic stenosis, is scheduled for elective valve replacement, and meets most inclusion criteria. However, physical ability to pedal a recumbent bicycle is unknown.
